fields.text: Thank you for calling 80Twenty, your premier marketing, sales, and creative staffing agency based in San Francisco.
If you are an employer looking to fill marketing, sales, or creative positions, press [INDEX].
For information on our candidate sourcing process, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to our candidate sourcing team.
To speak with an account manager, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to an account manager.
If you are a marketing, sales, or creative professional seeking new opportunities, press [INDEX].
To hear about current job openings, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to our recruitment team for current opportunities.
To speak directly with a recruiter, press [INDEX].
One moment please while we connect you to a recruiter.
